TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataControlReferenceIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

Docs.summary: Creates a user-selectable collection of data controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks At design time, the DataControlReferenceIDConverter class performs type conversion of the controls in the collection. This class is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A new instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter> class is created when the converter class is called by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that provides context information for this type converter.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of available control values.
Docs.returns: A collection that contains the names of the available controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GetStandardValues method gets the set of controls that can be converted. It creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> instance that contains objects that are valid data types in `context`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that provides context information to this type converter.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the returned control names are an exclusive list of all possible values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that provides context information to this type converter.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a standard set of control names that can be selected from the collection.
